author: LED Maniac

review: The Fire TV works great. Its easy to navigate and the voice search is very accurate. It's a powerful enough device to be very responsive, with smooth playback. Overall I'm very impressed, so why only 4 stars? Simple, Amazon is missing a golden opportunity. Amazon, I hope you are reading this. If the USB port could be utilized for an external hard drive, to which we had the option of downloading purchased movies for local playback on the device, I'd start buying most of my movies from Amazon in digital format. As it is, I'll rarely ever purchase a digital movie, if I don't have the option of local storage. Amazon, I'm sure a software update is all that would be required to make this happen, and you' d make a lot more money from me (and probably many other people, as well). Overall, I'd still highly recommend the device.

author: Wade Noxon

review: So I'm a bit behind on the technology learning curve, but I ordered an Amazon Fire TV and within 5 min., I was up and running.  EVERYONE NEEDS ONE OF THESE!  Only $99 to buy (don't get mad, Amazon--customers should check around because it's sometimes on sale elsewhere), no monthly cost; and if you have Amazon Prime, you can watch thousands of movies and shows on your TV instead of your tablet.  I recently signed up for Netflix; and for $8.99 a month, we can watch thousands of movies, premium TV shows, kids' cartoons, etc., on two TVs ($7.99 for one TV).  Best of all, it's the easiest thing in the world to install and use.  I ordered this one for downstairs and a Fire Stick for our bedroom TV.  This one has a voice feature--just say the name of a movie, actor, director, genre, etc., and it'll take you to it (hubby has issues with remotes, so I thought that feature was worth the extra money).  If you have Amazon Prime, Netflix, Hulu, etc., you have to get at least the inexpensive stick so you don't need to watch through a gaming box or--in my case--try to figure out how to watch on a TV instead of your tablet.  Either would make a great Christmas gift.
